channel.title: [317] How Do i Make NPC's Say PURE SHOP HERE [317]
channel.description:
Well I Was Wondering How Do i make The Npc's Talk Like Repeat Pure Shop HERE and Stuff like That if anyone Knows Please Give me The Code And Tell me where to place Here That whould Be Very Kind Of You :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:.
Here's A Picture Of What i Mean THIS PICTURE WAS TAKEN FROM A SERVER THAT I PLAYD
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2z8n3t2.jpg[/img]
AND I WANTED TO KNOW HOW TO MAKE THIS SAY ON CHATBOX EVERY 2 Mins "PLEASE DOWNLOAD CLIENT" PLEASE GIVE ME THE CODES AND TELL ME WHERE TO PLACE IT.
HERES A PICTURE
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/23vm0yf.jpg[/img] [br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 16, 2009, 10:34:39 pm[/size][hr]PLEASE HELP!
